MetadataCatalogItem.description:
An MetadataCatalogItem is an entity that allows any metadata asset or even any object inheriting from RootEntity, to be available to a catalog. The MetadataSpecification and Policy of the catalog governs the content of the MetadataCatalogItem. This API addresses only MetadataSpecification items extended from RootEntity as MetadataCatalogItem.
The MetadataCatalogItem resource (JSON format) represents a set of characteristics that define the values given by the MetadataCatalogItem.

description.description: Description of this metadata catalog item resource

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update of this REST resource

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status of this catalog item

name.description: Name given to this REST resource

validFor.description: The period for which this REST resource is valid

items.description: The category(ies) if any that refer to this catalog item

specification.description: The specification implied by this candidate
